description: Open-Responses Service statistics, customised from Spring boot 3.x dashboard.

targets.expr: irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{exported_instance=~"$instance", app="$application", exception="none", uri!~".*(prometheus|health).*", instance="$Namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{exported_instance=~"$instance", app="$application", exception="none",uri!~".*(prometheus|health).*", instance="$Namespace"}[$__rate_interval])

title: Open-Responses Service Stats
